text: Lateef Kayode Jakande (23 July 1929 â€“ 11 February 2021) was a Nigerian journalist and politician. He became governor of Lagos State in Nigeria from 1979 to 1983. He was later Minister of Works under the Sani Abacha military regime from 1993 to 1998. Jakande was born in Lagos Island, Nigeria. Jakande died on 11 February 2021 in Lagos, aged 91.First Civilian Governor Of Lagos State, Lateef Jakande Dies At 91 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Lagos
title: Lateef Jakande
